Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale 3653 Wayburne Drive in Burnaby, British Columbia (“3653, 3657, 3659, & 3665 Wayburne Drive, Burnaby”) (the “Property”). This rarely available, fully leased, and beautifully maintained industrial Property is ideally positioned between Burnaby’s most desired areas; Metrotown and Brentwood. The Property is a highly visible with great street frontage and is on an easily accessible ± 2.28 acre lot. 3653 Wayburne Drive is professionally managed, comes with abundant parking to the front and rear, and has stable income allowing ease for investors. The Property has immediate access to Trans Canada Highway, plenty of transit options, and is surrounded by numerous development sites; making 3653 Wayburne Drive an attractive lot for future redevelopment.

The subject property is only blocks away from the New St. Paul’s Hospital that is projected to be complete in 2026 at an estimated cost of $1.9 billion and is in close proximity to Emily Carr University of Art + Design and the Great Northern Way Campus which is home to the Centre for Digital Media. This area is a strategic location for city-serving industries and has a well established arts and cultural centre.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: As Western Canada’s largest industrial developer, Beedie continues to deliver state-of-the-art projects at the highest standard. DECA Business Centre in Delta is the latest addition to Beedie’s portfolio and offers businesses the opportunity to build equity in one of Metro Vancouver’s fastest growing industrial hubs. On behalf of Beedie, CBRE is pleased to market and offer ten (10) turnkey units for sale between 4,025 square feet and 4,919 square feet, including mezzanine area. Units will be equipped with the best-in-class specifications including LED lighting, skylights, gas fired unit heaters, 24’ ceiling heights, ESFR sprinklers, 3-phase power and large grade loading doors. DECA Business Centre is the last remaining phase of Beedie’s 1.75 million square foot master planned Delta Link Business Park. Future owners of DECA Business Centre can expect to join local and international businesses such as BMW, Leon’s Furniture/The Brick and North Delta Seafoods.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | DECA BUSINESS CENTRE, DELTA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Centrally located in the dynamic Mt. Pleasant area of Vancouver surrounded by Olympic Village, the Creative Campus in False Creek and the future St. Paul’s Hospital, this location has become the chosen destination for businesses seeking to take advantage of the many amenities the area has to offer. The Property is a mere five minutes to downtown Vancouver and is within easy walking distance to the Olympic Village, Main Street-Science World SkyTrain Stations and the futureGreat Northern Way–Emily Carr Station. There are numerous restaurants, coffee shops, and craft breweries in the area including Red Truck Brewing, Craft Beer Market, Brassneck Brewing, Railtown Café, Flying Pig, Nuba, Tractor, Starbucks, and Glory Juice to name just a few.Specifically, the Property is located on 2nd Avenue just east of Main Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: OFISWERKS by FORMWERKS, located at 234 West 3rd Avenue, is a newly developed AAA office and flex strata project in the heart of Mount Pleasant.  Formwerks Boutique Properties brings a timeless architectural presence to this evolving neighbourhood with classic, clean lines and industrial design elements that honour the history of the neighbourhood. The thoughtful design considers the future of tomorrow’s workplace, providing open concept plans with abundant natural light, natural shading through the use of green walls, and lush landscaping throughout. A second floor terrace, and gorgeous rooftop patio allow colleagues to unwind and reconnect while enjoying the picturesque city and mountain views. Building highlights include: 4,757 SF rooftop patio, end of trip facilities, loading doors, elevator, ceiling heights that range from 12' - 20', and 70 parking stalls including ample EV charging stations.

Vickers Way, near Ikea

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited’s Investment Specialists’ Yashar Khalighi Personal Real Estate Corporation and Lawson Chu are pleased to present the opportunity to purchase 12500 Vickers Way in Richmond, British Columbia. The Subject Property is a freestanding industrial/retail building comprising of approximately 28,791 of rentable square footage on a lot size of 1.027 acres. It boasts approximately 167 feet of frontage to Vickers Way and 264 feet in depth. The Property has been extensively improved with over $500,000 worth of improvements in the last few years and hosts showroom tenancies. There are a total of four units varying from industrial warehouse to retail showrooms. There are grade loading doors at the rear of the Property along with a large paved lot area suitable for storage and additional parking. The property offers 12’ ceilings, heavy power, ample parking in front for tenants and visitors, and is sprinklered throughout. The Subject Property has flexible tenancies, presenting a partial owner-occupier, value add investment opportunity, and leasing opportunities.

This innovative project offers thirteen (13) boutique industrial strata units for sale from 2,615 square feet in central Richmond. Units will come equipped with ample glazing and skylights, best-in-class specifications, 28’ ceiling heights, a 12’x14’ grade loading door and a finished washroom. Businesses will benefit from unfettered access to Highway 99, close proximity to Vancouver International Airport and the extensive amenities of Richmond’s City Centre, only minutes away.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | BRAND NEW INDUSTRIAL UNITS IN RICHMOND

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President
Sales Trainee

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: An opportunity to invest and build equity in your own real estate at the upcoming Ironwood Landing development, located in South Richmond at 12148 Horseshoe Way. Designed by KCC Architecture, Ironwood Landing will be comprised of 18 small bay strata units starting at 2,555 square feet. The units will come equipped with ample glazing, grade loading and an enclosed 2nd level office featuring HVAC and separate entrances. Ironwood Landing is built with e-commerce warehouse needs in mind and the Industrial Business Park (IB1) zoning permits a wide variety of allowable business uses including outright office. Businesses will benefit from efficient access to Highway 99, improved travel times from the George Massey tunnel and Corridor upgrades, close proximity to Vancouver International Airport and the amenities at the Ironwood Plaza, only minutes away.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | IRONWOOD LANDING

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: FLOORPLAN - 4382 WESTSHORE PARKWAY GLENSHIRE BUSINESS PARK - 2021-02

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Off Sooke Road, 5 min drive to Langford's core

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase new stratawarehouse units in the Glenshire Business Park. Purchasers have theability to work with Vendor and Architect to design and build out the space.  Located in one of the Westshore’s newest business parks, purchaser’s will benefit from flexible industrial zoning allowing a wide variety of uses.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Strata Warehouse Units in Glenshire Business Park

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Off Sooke Road, 5 min drive to Langford's core

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Glenshire Business Park is situated in a highly visible and convenient location at Westshore Parkway and Sooke Road and is just a 5 minutedrive to Langford’s main commercial core. With easy access to the Trans Canada Highway(#1), the location provides for easy servicing of Langford, up-island and the surrounding municipalities that make up the Westshore. It also benefits from being only a 25 minute drive to downtown Victoria.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Three New Warehouse Units in Glenshire Business Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Investment Properties Group is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase an industrial building in the Sooke Industrial Park. The 22,255 sf building currently has a national tenant with a lease in place but would vacate should the building sell to an owner occupier. The property has excellent general industrial zoning which allows for a wide range of uses.
